description.en:
What is Pepe Original Version(POV)?

Launched in 2/5/2023 by a Team based in Pepe Land, Pepe Original Version is tired of watching everyone play hot potato with the endless derivative ShibaKishuTurboFlokiMoon Inu coins. The Inu’s have had their day. It’s time for the most recognizable meme in the world to take his reign as king of the memes.
Pepe Original Version is here to make memecoins great again. Zero taxes, LP Locked and contract renounced, POV is a coin for the people, forever. Fueled by pure memetic power, let POV show you the way.
